TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AbstractQueuedLongSynchronizer extends Java.Util.Concurrent.Locks.AbstractOwnableSynchronizer implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.IO.ISerializable, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: A version of in which synchronization state is maintained as a long.

remarks.para: A version of in which synchronization state is maintained as a long. This class has exactly the same structure, properties, and methods as AbstractQueuedSynchronizer with the exception that all state-related parameters and results are defined as long rather than int. This class may be useful when creating synchronizers such as multilevel locks and barriers that require 64 bits of state.
See for usage notes and examples.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Acquire(int64 arg) cil managed

Docs.param: the acquire argument. This value is conveyed to but is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
Docs.summary: Acquires in exclusive mode, ignoring interrupts.

remarks.para: Acquires in exclusive mode, ignoring interrupts. Implemented by invoking at least once , returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking until success. This method can be used to implement method .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AcquireInterruptibly(int64 arg) cil managed

Docs.param: the acquire argument. This value is conveyed to but is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
Docs.summary: Acquires in exclusive mode, aborting if interrupted.

remarks.para: Acquires in exclusive mode, aborting if interrupted. Implemented by first checking interrupt status, then invoking at least once , returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking until success or the thread is interrupted. This method can be used to implement method .

Docs.exception: if the current thread is interrupted

Docs.param: the acquire argument. This value is conveyed to but is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
Docs.summary: Acquires in shared mode, ignoring interrupts.

remarks.para: Acquires in shared mode, ignoring interrupts. Implemented by first invoking at least once , returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking until success.

Docs.param: the acquire argument. This value is conveyed to but is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
Docs.summary: Acquires in shared mode, aborting if interrupted.

remarks.para: Acquires in shared mode, aborting if interrupted. Implemented by first checking interrupt status, then invoking at least once , returning on success. Otherwise the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking until success or the thread is interrupted.

MemberSignature.Value: protected bool CompareAndSetState (long expect, long update);
.method familyhidebysig instance bool CompareAndSetState(int64 expect, int64 update) cil managed

Docs.param: the expected value
the new value
Docs.summary: Atomically sets synchronization state to the given updated value if the current state value equals the expected value.

remarks.para: Atomically sets synchronization state to the given updated value if the current state value equals the expected value. This operation has memory semantics of a volatile read and write.

Docs.summary: Returns a collection containing threads that may be waiting to acquire in exclusive mode.

remarks.para: Returns a collection containing threads that may be waiting to acquire in exclusive mode. This has the same properties as except that it only returns those threads waiting due to an exclusive acquire.

Docs.summary: Returns the first (longest-waiting) thread in the queue, or null if no threads are currently queued.

remarks.para: Returns the first (longest-waiting) thread in the queue, or null if no threads are currently queued.
In this implementation, this operation normally returns in constant time, but may iterate upon contention if other threads are concurrently modifying the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class Java.Lang.Thread> GetWaitingThreads(class Java.Util.Concurrent.Locks.AbstractQueuedLongSynchronizer/ConditionObject condition) cil managed

Docs.param: the condition
Docs.summary: Returns a collection containing those threads that may be waiting on the given condition associated with this synchronizer.

remarks.para: Returns a collection containing those threads that may be waiting on the given condition associated with this synchronizer. Because the actual set of threads may change dynamically while constructing this result, the returned collection is only a best-effort estimate. The elements of the returned collection are in no particular order.

Docs.exception: if exclusive synchronization is not held
if the given condition is not associated with this synchronizer
if the condition is null

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 GetWaitQueueLength(class Java.Util.Concurrent.Locks.AbstractQueuedLongSynchronizer/ConditionObject condition) cil managed

Docs.param: the condition
Docs.summary: Returns an estimate of the number of threads waiting on the given condition associated with this synchronizer.

remarks.para: Returns an estimate of the number of threads waiting on the given condition associated with this synchronizer. Note that because timeouts and interrupts may occur at any time, the estimate serves only as an upper bound on the actual number of waiters. This method is designed for use in monitoring of the system state, not for synchronization control.

Docs.exception: if exclusive synchronization is not held
if the given condition is not associated with this synchronizer
if the condition is null

Docs.summary: Queries whether any threads have ever contended to acquire this synchronizer; that is if an acquire method has ever blocked.

remarks.para: Queries whether any threads have ever contended to acquire this synchronizer; that is if an acquire method has ever blocked.
In this implementation, this operation returns in constant time.

Docs.summary: Queries whether any threads have been waiting to acquire longer than the current thread.

remarks.para: Queries whether any threads have been waiting to acquire longer than the current thread.
An invocation of this method is equivalent to (but may be more efficient than): getFirstQueuedThread() != Thread.currentThread() && hasQueuedThreads()

Note that because cancellations due to interrupts and timeouts may occur at any time, a true return does not guarantee that some other thread will acquire before the current thread. Likewise, it is possible for another thread to win a race to enqueue after this method has returned false, due to the queue being empty.

Docs.summary: Queries whether any threads are waiting to acquire.

remarks.para: Queries whether any threads are waiting to acquire. Note that because cancellations due to interrupts and timeouts may occur at any time, a true return does not guarantee that any other thread will ever acquire.
In this implementation, this operation returns in constant time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool HasWaiters(class Java.Util.Concurrent.Locks.AbstractQueuedLongSynchronizer/ConditionObject condition) cil managed

Docs.param: the condition
Docs.summary: Queries whether any threads are waiting on the given condition associated with this synchronizer.

remarks.para: Queries whether any threads are waiting on the given condition associated with this synchronizer. Note that because timeouts and interrupts may occur at any time, a true return does not guarantee that a future signal will awaken any threads. This method is designed primarily for use in monitoring of the system state.

Docs.exception: if exclusive synchronization is not held
if the given condition is not associated with this synchronizer
if the condition is null

Docs.summary: Returns true if synchronization is held exclusively with respect to the current (calling) thread.

remarks.para: Returns true if synchronization is held exclusively with respect to the current (calling) thread. This method is invoked upon each call to a non-waiting method. (Waiting methods instead invoke .)
The default implementation throws . This method is invoked internally only within methods, so need not be defined if conditions are not used.

Docs.exception: if conditions are not supported

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsQueued(class Java.Lang.Thread thread) cil managed

Docs.param: the thread
Docs.summary: Returns true if the given thread is currently queued.

remarks.para: Returns true if the given thread is currently queued.
This implementation traverses the queue to determine presence of the given thread.

Docs.exception: if the thread is null

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Owns(class Java.Util.Concurrent.Locks.AbstractQueuedLongSynchronizer/ConditionObject condition) cil managed

Docs.param: the condition
Docs.summary: Queries whether the given ConditionObject uses this synchronizer as its lock.

remarks.para: Queries whether the given ConditionObject uses this synchronizer as its lock.

Docs.exception: if the condition is null

Docs.summary: Returns a collection containing threads that may be waiting to acquire.

remarks.para: Returns a collection containing threads that may be waiting to acquire. Because the actual set of threads may change dynamically while constructing this result, the returned collection is only a best-effort estimate. The elements of the returned collection are in no particular order. This method is designed to facilitate construction of subclasses that provide more extensive monitoring facilities.

Docs.summary: Returns an estimate of the number of threads waiting to acquire.

remarks.para: Returns an estimate of the number of threads waiting to acquire. The value is only an estimate because the number of threads may change dynamically while this method traverses internal data structures. This method is designed for use in monitoring system state, not for synchronization control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Release(int64 arg) cil managed

Docs.param: the release argument. This value is conveyed to but is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
Docs.summary: Releases in exclusive mode.

remarks.para: Releases in exclusive mode. Implemented by unblocking one or more threads if returns true. This method can be used to implement method .

Docs.param: the release argument. This value is conveyed to but is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
Docs.summary: Releases in shared mode.

remarks.para: Releases in shared mode. Implemented by unblocking one or more threads if returns true.

Docs.summary: Returns a collection containing threads that may be waiting to acquire in shared mode.

remarks.para: Returns a collection containing threads that may be waiting to acquire in shared mode. This has the same properties as except that it only returns those threads waiting due to a shared acquire.

Docs.summary: Returns the current value of synchronization state.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
Returns the current value of synchronization state. This operation has memory semantics of a volatile read.

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
Sets the value of synchronization state. This operation has memory semantics of a volatile write.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryAcquire(int64 arg) cil managed

Docs.param: the acquire argument. This value is always the one passed to an acquire method, or is the value saved on entry to a condition wait. The value is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
Docs.summary: Attempts to acquire in exclusive mode.

remarks.para: Attempts to acquire in exclusive mode. This method should query if the state of the object permits it to be acquired in the exclusive mode, and if so to acquire it.

This method is always invoked by the thread performing acquire. If this method reports failure, the acquire method may queue the thread, if it is not already queued, until it is signalled by a release from some other thread. This can be used to implement method .
The default implementation throws .

Docs.exception: if acquiring would place this synchronizer in an illegal state. This exception must be thrown in a consistent fashion for synchronization to work correctly.
if exclusive mode is not supported

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryAcquireNanos (long arg, long nanosTimeout);
.method public hidebysig instance bool TryAcquireNanos(int64 arg, int64 nanosTimeout) cil managed

Docs.param: the acquire argument. This value is conveyed to but is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
the maximum number of nanoseconds to wait
Docs.summary: Attempts to acquire in exclusive mode, aborting if interrupted, and failing if the given timeout elapses.

remarks.para: Attempts to acquire in exclusive mode, aborting if interrupted, and failing if the given timeout elapses. Implemented by first checking interrupt status, then invoking at least once , returning on success. Otherwise, the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking until success or the thread is interrupted or the timeout elapses. This method can be used to implement method .

Docs.exception: if the current thread is interrupted

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance int64 TryAcquireShared(int64 arg) cil managed

Docs.param: the acquire argument. This value is always the one passed to an acquire method, or is the value saved on entry to a condition wait. The value is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
Docs.summary: Attempts to acquire in shared mode.

remarks.para: Attempts to acquire in shared mode. This method should query if the state of the object permits it to be acquired in the shared mode, and if so to acquire it.

This method is always invoked by the thread performing acquire. If this method reports failure, the acquire method may queue the thread, if it is not already queued, until it is signalled by a release from some other thread.
The default implementation throws .

Docs.exception: if acquiring would place this synchronizer in an illegal state. This exception must be thrown in a consistent fashion for synchronization to work correctly.
if shared mode is not supported

Implemented by first checking interrupt status, then invoking at least once , returning on success. Otherwise, the thread is queued, possibly repeatedly blocking and unblocking, invoking until success or the thread is interrupted or the timeout elapses.

This method is always invoked by the thread performing release.
